content:
The $everything operation (Patient resource) specifies input parameters start, end date. I'm curious how some of you may have reconciled that against specific date parameters supported by resources related to the Patient. Do you attempt to use parameters supported by the related resource?

For example, Observation.date or Observation.value-date or Condition.onset-date or Condition.asserted-date, etc.

Or do you just add some non-standard parameter support to your resource providers? eg: Observation.start, Observation.end
there's no fixed way - a server may even make decisions based on data not explicit in the resources. in my server, I ignore those parameters for now, so I'm no help :-(
I think in my server I'm using the lastModified date with those filters. But I'd need to check
